trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_AIRSHIP_SELECT_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E803 /var>/<var 20 E804 /var> Ceruleum tanks: <var 20 E802 /var> Select an airship.
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_ADD_NEW_AIRSHIP<tab>Outfit and register an airship. (Flight credits required: <var 20 E802 /var>)

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_AIRSHIP_NAME<tab><var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var>. (Rank: <var 20 E806 /var>) <var 09 E803 (()) (()) (( (Voyage complete in <var 08 E1E80701 ((<var 20 E807 /var>d )) (()) /var><var 08 E1E80401 ((<var 20 E804 /var>h )) (()) /var><var 20 E805 /var>m) )) (( (Mission complete in <var 08 E1E80701 ((<var 20 E807 /var>d )) (()) /var><var 08 E1E80401 ((<var 20 E804 /var>h )) (()) /var><var 20 E805 /var>m) )) (( (Awaiting alliance parties))) /var>

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_AIRSHIP_CMD_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E805 /var>/<var 20 E806 /var> Ceruleum tanks: <var 20 E803 /var> <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var> (Rank: <var 20 E804 /var>) - Available

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_AIRSHIP_VOY_TITLE<tab>Vessels deployed: <var 20 E804 /var>/<var 20 E805 /var> <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var> (Rank: <var 20 E803 /var>) - Deployed Voyage complete in <var 08 E1E80601 ((<var 20 E806 /var>d )) (()) /var><var 08 E1E80701 ((<var 20 E807 /var>h )) (()) /var><var 20 E808 /var>m

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_AIRSHIP_NAME_MES_0<tab>Names must be formed from alphanumeric characters. The following punctuation marks are also allowed: <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>'<var 1D /var>. , : ; ! ? & - _<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> • Double spaces/underscores are not allowed. • A space cannot be used before or after the name. • Names consisting solely of punctuation marks are prohibited.

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_REMOVE_AIRSHIP_TITLE<tab>Are you certain you wish to dismantle <var 1A 02 /var><var 29 EA02 /var><var 1A 01 /var>? <var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var>Please note that while airship components will be returned, your airship's registration, rank, and accrued experience will be lost.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_REGISTRATION_1<tab>To outfit and register an airship, you must have in your possession the requisite components and flight credits.

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_REGISTRATION_2<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Flight credits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_REGISTRATION_3<tab><var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Airship components<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be constructed in your company workshop. Please note that hull, rigging, forecastle, and aftcastle components are required to outfit an airship.

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_ENERGY<tab>You cannot deploy your airship on exploratory voyages without ceruleum tanks, which can be purchased from resident caretakers with company credits.

TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_EXPLOG_1<tab>Upon the completion of an exploratory voyage, your mammet will provide a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>voyage log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> detailing the results.
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_EXPLOG_2<tab>The information contained in this log may prove useful in preparing for your next exploratory voyage.
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_EXPLOG_3<tab>Please note that only the log for the previous voyage will be retained.
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NO_REPAIR_ITEM<tab>You cannot repair airship components without the requisite materials.
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_CONTENT_GUIDE<tab>You have successfully charted a new course through the Sea of Clouds! You may now challenge the Diadem (Hard).
TEXT_CMNDEFCOMPANYCOMMANDERBOARD_00258_NOT_IMPLEMENTED_SORA2<tab>ディアデム諸島に至る空路の風脈が乱れているため、 現在、探索を行うことができません。 風脈の安定をお待ちください。
